*Muskaan Dreams is hiring* 

𝐑𝐨𝐥𝐞: 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐨𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐭𝐞

📍 Locations: Indore, Agra, Pune, Sheopur, Lucknow, Gangapur, Noida, Shivpuri, Mohali, Jaipur, Guna 

Not all jobs carry a purpose, adventure, and real impact, but this one does. Apply if you think you meet the following criteria-:

✔From bureaucrats to school teachers, you know how to build relationships like a pro.
✔ You can help hesitant teachers take their first step into digital learning 
✔ A digital literacy enthusiast who knows education is the future

𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭'𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐢𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐲𝐨𝐮: 

✔The chance to work with government officials and education leaders to drive real policy conversations
✔Running block & district-level events that bring digital literacy to life
✔Visiting schools, meeting students and teachers, assessing impact that is real & deeply rewarding
✔Traveling to different states, cities, and districts because big change doesn’t happen from behind a desk

If this sounds like something you’d do, then we, are looking for you!

📩 Send your CV to https://lnkd.in/gPcgUtUf
